overview:
## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/jsonRepresentation] is UTF-8 string data. You can use the JSON data to decode the product information into your own data type instead of using the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product] value directly.

# jsonRepresentation

**Instance Property**

The JSON representation of the product information.

## Declaration

```swift
var jsonRepresentation: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/jsonRepresentation] is UTF-8 string data. You can use the JSON data to decode the product information into your own data type instead of using the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product] value directly.
title: jsonRepresentation
